body:
Hola Amigos,

Como te va? <---And that's as far as I can get to in Spanish....

But that's not to put me down! :D 

I have been mainly playing walls on Avicus, as some of you might know..And I decided to start recording all my games on walls. I already have the two parts made. But I decided to only show the first one for now!

I hope you enjoy 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwmO7WDoU_w

-Pat :)
